name: Altius Minerals Corporation
longDescription: Altius Minerals Corp is engaged in the business of obtaining diversified mining royalty. It holds interests in mining operations that produce metals and minerals such as copper, zinc, nickel, cobalt, gold, silver, and potash. The corporation also holds other pre-development stage royalty interests and various earlier stage royalties. It is engaged in the operating segments of MineralRoyalties, Renewable Royalties and Project Generation.

fullAddress: 38 Duffy Place,2nd Floor, St. John's, NL, CA
